body_html: @justinrmiller they claim they can't test it anymore on mac os, and therefore decided to stop the support. however, I'm having a hard time believing that. Going forward with the advert of egpus on high sierra and with new nvidia drivers, this will no longer be the case.

body: @justinrmiller they claim they can't test it anymore on mac os, and therefore decided to stop the support. however, I'm having a hard time believing that. Going forward with the advert of egpus on high sierra and with new nvidia drivers, this will no longer be the case.
